properties.title: Guggihütte SAC
properties.description: Simple, rarely visited alpine cabin on the jagged north side of Mönch and Jungfraujoch, with a view across the Bernese foothills and the Mittelland to Chasseral. Located on a rocky promontory, it is the starting point for the ascent of Mönch via Nollen or Jungfrau via Silberhorn, two classic tours. In summer the access trail is for experienced mountain hikers only, in winter, due to snow and ice, to very experienced ones.
